Producer: Lee Eisenberg, Evan Goldberg, Seth Rogen, James Weaver
Production Co: Universal Pictures, Point Grey Pictures Inc., Good Universe
Rating: R (Language Throughout|Drug and Alcohol Material|Strong Crude Sexual Content)
Synopsis: Invited to his first kissing party, 12-year-old Max asks his best friends Lucas and Thor for some much-needed help on how to pucker up. When they hit a dead end, Max decides to use his father's drone to spy on the teenage girls next door. When the boys lose the drone, they skip school and hatch a plan to retrieve it before Max's dad can figure out what happened.
Title: Good Boys
